snippet: Among the revelations contained in Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s coming memoir: He learned about his divorce from a journalist and blames himself for his father’s political demise.
abstract: Upcoming memoir from New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, titled All Things Possible: Setbacks and Success in Politics and Life, sets down a largely positive narrative of his life, though it contains some potent revelations; book discloses that Cuomo learned about his divorce from a journalist, and that he blames himself for the political demise of his father, former Gov Mario Cuomo.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and SUSANNE CRAIG

lead_paragraph: Among the revelations contained in Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s coming memoir: He learned about his divorce from a journalist and blames himself for his father’s political demise.

headline.main: Cuomo Reflects in Memoir on Highs and Lows, Both Personal and Political
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Reflects in Memoir on Highs and Lows, Both Personal and Political

keywords.value: All Things Possible: Setbacks and Success in Politics and Life (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
